title: Deere stock shots up after outlook lift
text:
Deere stock shots up after outlook lift 01:21
U.S. tractor and construction equipment maker Deere & Co revised up its full-year earnings estimate on stronger demand for its construction equipment, sending shares higher. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. tractor and construction equipment maker Deere & Co revised up its full-year earnings estimate on stronger demand for its construction equipment, sending shares higher.
